text: Ate alaha nu niradharita kite dina vica yada karo. Phira jihara bada jaladi hi do dinam vica maka vapasa a jave. Usa upara ko'i papa nahim ate jihara bada ruka jave usa upara vi ko'i papa nahim. Iha usa la'i hai jihara alaha tom dare ate tusim alaha tom darade raho ate cagi tar'ham jana lavo ki tusim usa de kola ikathe kite javoge
